name: The Boss
description:
The Boss
Developed for GMTK Game Jam 2019

You need to defeat The Invader, a powerful creature that guards the battle arena.
Each stage of the battle gives you new skills, but, increases the difficult of the fight.
Watch your movements to defeat this Boss, in an awesome and frenetic battle!

This game is open source! You can check the code at:
https://github.com/arturnista/gmtk2019_unity
